idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.2 (Build 3790) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

descript.abstract: REQUIRED: A brief narrative summary of the data set.
descript.purpose: REQUIRED: A summary of the intentions with which the data set was developed.

citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: gisdata.GISADMIN.Parcels2

timeperd.current: REQUIRED: The basis on which the time period of content information is determined.

sngdate.caldate: REQUIRED: The year (and optionally month, or month and day) for which the data set corresponds to the ground.

status.progress: REQUIRED: The state of the data set.
status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.
theme.themekey: REQUIRED: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.

idinfo.accconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing the data set.
idinfo.useconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for using the data set after access is granted.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.0.3035

idCitation.otherCitDet: Parcel Data is updated frequently. Please contact the GIS Specialist if use requires up-to-date data.

dataExt.exDesc: Extent of data is inside the City Limits of the City of Bangor.

dataIdInfo.idPurp: To provide a citywide digital tax parcel dataset. Property maps are a fundamental base for many municipal activities. Although GIS parcels data cannot replace detailed ground surveys, the data can assist municipal officials with functions such as accurate property tax assessment, planning and zoning. This dataset can be linked to the Assessors' TRIO Database to geographically display physical characteristics and property ownership information across the entire city.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset contains the tax parcel data for the City of Bangor, Maine.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Parcel Data has been improved and maintained primarily by the Geographic Information Specialist at the City of Bangor, with assistance from the Assessing Department.

LegConsts.useLimit: This dataset is for planning purposes only and should not be used for conveyance of land. Users must assume responsibility in determining the usability of this data for their purposes. Digital maps retain the accuracy of their source materials. Please check sources, scale, accuracy, currentness and other available information. Please confirm that you are using the correct copy of both data and metadata .

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Assessor's Map number on which the parcel is located
Lot number of parcel, as shown on Assessor's map.
Unit or "sublot" number as indicated on Assessor's maps
Compiled Map, Lot, and Unit numbers, which together can be used as a unique identifier for a parcel.
Account number as indicated in Assessor's database. Most reliable source for joining parcel geometry to assessing table.
Number of owners of a parcel. Parcels are "stacked" when more than one entity owns a parcel.
Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

Consts.useLimit: This dataset is for planning purposes only and should not be used for conveyance of land. Users must assume responsibility in determining the usability of this data for their purposes. Digital maps retain the accuracy of their source materials. Please check sources, scale, accuracy, currentness and other available information. Please confirm that you are using the correct copy of both data and metadata.
